kpi.name: M1022C183

kpi_info.title: DCH/DCH PACKET CALL ATT FOR STREAMING
kpi_info.use: The number of DCH/DCH packet call attempts for the streaming traffic class. UPDATED: When the UE-specific packet scheduler attempts to allocate a DCH/DCH transport channel for the PS Streaming RAB, and there are no dedicated/shared channels that are already allocated for the RAB.

kpi.kpi_alias: DCH/DCH PACKET CALL ATT FOR STREAMING
